mission: Research affordable used Japanese sedans in Canada priced CAD $5,000-$10,000

tasks.description: Find Facebook Marketplace listings for used Japanese sedans
tasks.summary: Located multiple Facebook Marketplace listings across Canadian cities with prices in target range
gaps: Login required to view full listings

source_assessments.reasoning: User-generated content but well-established platform with some verification

consistency_issues.description: Pricing varies significantly by region and model year
consistency_issues.suggested_action: Recommend comparing prices across at least 3 regions for accuracy
